---
name: Pipelines Gallery
about: Create a gallery of 5 complete pipeline examples with run commands
title: "[v1.1] Pipelines Gallery with 5 Complete Examples"
labels: ["enhancement", "v1.1", "documentation", "examples"]
assignees: []
---

## Overview

Create a Pipelines Gallery showcasing 5 complete, production-ready pipeline examples with documentation, screenshots, and one-command run instructions.

## Goals

- **5 Complete Examples**: Different use cases (static site, API service, ETL, etc.)
- **Documentation**: Each example has README with description, usage, and screenshots
- **Run Commands**: One-command execution from README
- **Visual Reports**: Include sample DOT/PNG graphs and execution reports
- **Best Practices**: Demonstrate framework capabilities

## Pipeline Examples

### 1. Static Site Generator
- **Use Case**: Generate static website from markdown
- **Agents**: Requirements, Architecture, Frontend, Docs
- **Output**: Static HTML site

### 2. REST API Service
- **Use Case**: FastAPI service with OpenAPI docs
- **Agents**: Requirements, Backend, API Design, Testing
- **Output**: Complete API service

### 3. ETL Pipeline
- **Use Case**: Data extraction, transformation, loading
- **Agents**: Requirements, Data Modeler, Backend, Testing
- **Output**: ETL pipeline code

### 4. CLI Tool
- **Use Case**: Command-line utility
- **Agents**: Requirements, Architecture, Backend, Docs
- **Output**: CLI tool with help

### 5. Microservice
- **Use Case**: Microservice with Docker
- **Agents**: Requirements, Architecture, Backend, DevOps, Testing
- **Output**: Complete microservice

## Structure

```
pipeline/gallery/
├── static-site/
│   ├── pipeline.yaml
│   ├── README.md
│   ├── report.png
│   └── pipeline.dot
├── api-service/
│   ├── pipeline.yaml
│   ├── README.md
│   ├── report.png
│   └── pipeline.dot
├── etl-pipeline/
│   ├── pipeline.yaml
│   ├── README.md
│   ├── report.png
│   └── pipeline.dot
├── cli-tool/
│   ├── pipeline.yaml
│   ├── README.md
│   ├── report.png
│   └── pipeline.dot
└── microservice/
    ├── pipeline.yaml
    ├── README.md
    ├── report.png
    └── pipeline.dot
```

## Documentation Requirements

Each example should include:

1. **README.md**:
   - Description
   - Use case
   - Quick start (one command)
   - Expected output
   - Screenshots

2. **pipeline.yaml**:
   - Complete, working pipeline
   - Comments explaining stages
   - Dependencies defined

3. **Visual Assets**:
   - Pipeline graph (DOT/PNG)
   - Execution report screenshot
   - Sample output

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] 5 complete pipeline examples created
- [ ] Each example has README with one-command run
- [ ] Pipeline graphs generated and included
- [ ] Execution reports generated and documented
- [ ] Gallery index page (`pipeline/gallery/README.md`)
- [ ] All examples tested and working
- [ ] Documentation links from main README

- #XXX - Plugin API (examples may use plugins)
- #XXX - multiagent new command (may generate from gallery)

## Estimated Effort

**Medium** (3-4 days)

## Priority

**High** - Improves developer experience and showcases capabilities
